title: Trial By Kyle's Anna Heinrich defends her shock-jock co-star Sandilands
text:
Anna Heinrich works closely with Kyle Sandilands on Trial By Kyle.

And the former Bachelor star insists that the shock jock is a stellar co-star - and that TV could use more stars like him.

Speaking to the Herald Sun, the 32-year-old said: 'I really think the Australian media needs more people like him'.

'The Australian media needs more people like him!' Trial By Kyle's Anna Heinrich (pictured) On Friday defended her shock-jock co-star Sandilands

She went on to say that Kyle's new $50 million dollar deal with KIIS FM is proof he has the formula down.

'He's just signed a new five-year contract to do his radio show with Jackie O. Clearly what he is doing is working,' she said.

Anna went on: 'It's funny because I am the total opposite to Kyle. I think that's probably why we work so well together.'

Speaking to the Herald Sun, the 32-year-old said: 'I really think the Australian media needs more people like him'. Pictured: Kyle Sandilands

Despite her admiration, Trial By Kyle's legal expert Anna has also hinted that she also experienced her own clashes with the show's 'judge' Kyle during filming.

Speaking to TV Week, the criminal lawyer described herself and the radio shock-jock as 'polar opposites'.

She said: 'I don't always agree with him and he certainly doesn't agree with me, but that's what makes it so fun.'

Knows his stuff: She went on to say that Kyle's new $50 million dollar deal with KIIS FM is proof he has the formula down. Pictured on Trial by Kyle

Doing well! 'He's just signed a new five-year contract to do his radio show with Jackie O. Clearly what he is doing is working,' she said. Pictured on Trial by Kyle

But Anna happily admitted the KIIS FM host was 'very professional' and 'perfect for the role'.

In the new show, Kyle has the ultimate position of power as he settles disputes between friends in a Judge Rinder style set-up.

Meanwhile, criminal lawyer Anna steps in as Kyle's legal counsel, offering guidance as he hears each case.

Anna first hit TV screens in 2013 after appearing on Australia's first season of The Bachelor with Tim Robards.
description: Anna Heinrich works closely with Kyle Sandilands on Trial By Kyle.
authors: Marta Jary For Daily Mail Australia
